title: The Arrangement 11: The Ferro Family
description: THE SERIES WITH OVER A MILLION COPIES SOLD~Volume 11 in the New York Times Bestselling Arrangement Serials~Sean Ferro is my addiction. I can’t tell him no, no matter what he asks for, and I know there are so many dark questions behind those blue eyes, so many things he wants me to do with him. When I watch him go down on one knee, with his sexy body covered in sand, and hold up a glittering ring, I can barely stand. It looks like he’s going to propose, and I know exactly what I’m going to say.Genre: New Adult RomanceThis story unfolds over multiple volumes approx. 20,000 words each.~The Arrangement Vol 1-11 are on sale now.~
author: H.M. Ward
